title: 求CrackShot插件的配置表，顺便帮我改一下我的枪
author: TT12345699
txt_content: 求CrackShot插件的配置表，顺便帮我改一下，如题啊   文件上传了怎么把射速改快点，还有别的配置表可以给我一点嘛？

replies.author: n1109964492
replies.txt_content:
Blutsauger:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&c&l布罗特萨奥格&c"
        Item_Type: 382
        Item_Lore: "&c&l这个武器可以从你命中的目标身上偷取生命..."
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: arrow
        Remove_Arrows_On_Impact: true
        Projectile_Speed: 40           这是改枪的射速
        Projectile_Damage: 6
        Sounds_Shoot: SHOOT_ARROW-1-0-0,ZOMBIE_WOOD-0.3-2-0
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
        Bullet_Spread: 0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 40
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true
        Reload_Duration: 22
        Sounds_Reloading: FIZZ-1-2-5,PISTON_EXTEND-1-2-15,Fizz-1-2-15
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
        Death_No_Drop: true
    Fully_Automatic:
        Enable: true
        Fire_Rate: 6
    Potion_Effects:
        Activation: hit
        Potion_Effect_Shooter: HEAL-0-1
    Critical_Hits:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 12
        Chance: 30
        Message_Shooter: "&b&l暴击！"
        Sounds_Shooter: NOTE_PLING-2-2-0,NOTE_STICKS-2-2-0
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Critical: block_break-133复制代码

怎么改射速？
